name: Stephen Hebert
summary: Experienced full stack web development professional seeking fully remote opportunities in development, management & technical training.

roles.title: Lead Developer / Manager
roles.description: Managing development for enterprise Agile modernization project.  Coding, testing, reviewing, deploying of application.  Providing technical guidance to project managers, product owners, & business analysts. Migrating database systems from Lotus Notes & mainframe systems to SQL Server. Developing standards for security, auditing, CI/CD, UI/UX, performance & automated testing. Configuring servers to meet project needs. Diagnosing & resolving network & production issues.  Supporting statewide developer recruiting, training & mentorship.
highlights: Architected PBAC system to meet business needs & InfoSec requirements.
Led development of public-facing reactive web application for state agency for performance, maintainability, & accessibility.
Managed development of second public-facing reactive web application.

roles.title: Senior Developer
roles.description: Coded, tested, reviewed, deployed, released, administrated, maintained, supported enterprise Agile modernization project.
highlights: Developed Javascript libraries for custom typeahead & grid UI components.
roles.environment: Javascript, Vue, C#, Github, Agile, HTML, CSS, JIRA, AWS S3, ADFS, Identity Server, IIS, SQL Server 2016, EF Core, Octopus, Cypress, Veracode, Figma

roles.title: Technical Analyst
roles.description: Provided user, network, server & cloud service administration & technical support.

roles.title: Developer, Consultant, Technical Trainer
roles.description: Consulted for various web design & development projects.  Provided individual instruction on topics related to web development.

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Coded, tested, provisioned, supported, administrated proprietary network product & service.
highlights: Developed web-based network configuration interface for modified routing appliance.
Implemented tools to foster developer communication & collaboration.
roles.environment: Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, HTML, Javascript, Subversion, Bugzilla

roles.title: QA & Support Analyst
roles.description: Manually tested user interfaces & function of proprietary rackmount appliance & documented any existing issues. Provisioned & shipped Espion products.  Provided technical support via phone & email.

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Developed & maintained static website.  Provided hardware, software, peripheral, database & network support.

roles.title: Technical Instructor / DBA
roles.description: Provided group & individual instruction on topics related to web development & office software. Maintained Lotus Notes databases & applications.
roles.environment: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Photoshop, Lotus Notes

roles.title: Developer / Co-founder
roles.description: Designed, developed & deployed static websites for small private & public clients.

roles.title: Support Technician
roles.description: Provided technical support via phone & in person.  Initialized, installed, configured, issued & supported Windows workstations.  Troubleshooted & repaired computer systems & peripherals.
